entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 06:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -38.1°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -42.0°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 37.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
